row.Name: AcceptedByOriginator
row.Description: Marks an answer as the most helpful to the original questioner.

row.Name: UpMod
row.Description: Marks a question or answer to be worthy.

row.Name: DownMod
row.Description: Marks a question or answer to be worthless or unsuitable.

row.Name: Offensive
row.Description: Marks a question or answer as rude or aggressive.

row.Name: Close
row.Description: Nominate a question for closing, and eventual deletion.

row.Name: Reopen
row.Description: Nominate a closed question to be reopened for further answers.

row.Name: BountyStart
row.Description: Question owner places a bounty on her/his question.

row.Name: BountyClose
row.Description: An open bounty is completed, either by the owner or system selecting an accepted answer.

row.Name: Deletion
row.Description: Nominate a post to be deleted.

row.Name: Undeletion
row.Description: Nominate a post to be undeleted.

row.Name: Spam
row.Description: Flags a post as advertising spam.

row.Name: InformModerator
row.Description: Flags a post for moderators to review.
